title: Alpha Buying: Private Credit Isn't the Villain Headlines Claim It Is - Benzinga
summary:
According to the headlines private credit is about bringing the financial apocalypse down upon all our heads.
Private credit is even worse than private equity and the public is crazy to put their money into the publicly traded vehicles that invest this way.
The Goldman Touch: GSBD Offers Serious Yield Goldman Sachs BDC GSBD isn’t your typical corporate lending operation.
When they decided to get into the BDC business, they brought their entire deal sourcing machine with them.
The Goldman Touch: GSBD Offers Serious Yield Goldman Sachs BDC GSBD isn’t your typical corporate lending operation.
